description:
Hey, explorers! Save up to 80% on great local restaurants, relaxing spas, unique products, exotic vacations and more with LivingSocial for iPhone and iPad. Like a close friend who’s always in the know, we’ll help you discover and share the best things to see and do in your city.

Unique Local Experiences
We’re always on the hunt for the best things to see and do. From gourmet tasting menus to hot stone massages to music festivals, we’ll make sure you never miss a beat.

Incredible Travel Packages
Whether you’re looking for a weekend getaway nearby or an unforgettable vacation abroad, we have you covered with amazing escapes and travel packages.

Great Products Shipped To You
With hundreds of unique products like electronics, home decor, fashion accessories, and more, you’ll always save big on your favorite finds.

How Does It Work?

Discover: Find deals near you by checking the map, filter by category, search, or browse.
Buy: Purchase a deal quickly, easily, and safely with the tap of a finger.
Redeem: Access any purchase under Vouchers, follow the instructions, and enjoy!
releaseNotes:
Gift shop
- Adds the LivingSocial Gift Shop; find the perfect gift for the holidays!

Refer a friend 
- Refer a friend to LivingSocial and we'll give both you and your friend deal bucks! 
- Can refer someone from the accounts screen

- Fixes rare occurrence where navigation items would not load properly
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements
